original_text: They shall remove all the fat, just as the fat is removed from the lamb of the fellowship offering, and the priest shall burn it on the altar on top of the food offerings presented to the Lord. In this way the priest will make atonement for them for the sin they have committed, and they will be forgiven.
korean_text: 그 모든 기름을 화목제 어린 양의 기름을 떼낸 것 같이 떼내어 제단 위 여호와의 화제물 위에서 불사를지니 이같이 제사장이 그가 범한 죄에 대하여 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: They shall remove all the fat
just as the fat is removed from the lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 양에서 기름이 제거되는 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall burn it
on the altar on top of the food offerings
the priest will make atonement for them
for the sin they have committed
